alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montgomery, southwestern San Jacinto and south central Walker Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Conroe Dam, or 7 miles west of Conroe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Willis, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Panorama Village, Cut And Shoot, New Waverly and Lake Conroe Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
